Package wtf.choco.dragoneggdrop.dragon.loot.pool

Class LootPoolItem

java.lang.Object
wtf.choco.dragoneggdrop.dragon.loot.pool.LootPoolItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILootPool<DragonLootElementItem>
public class LootPoolItem
extends Object
Represents a ILootPool implementation for DragonLootElementItems.
Author:
Parker Hawke - Choco

    • LootPoolItem

      public LootPoolItem​(String name, double chance, int minRolls, int maxRolls, Collection<DragonLootElementItem> itemElements)
      Create an item loot pool.
      Parameters:
      name - this pool's name. Can be null
      chance - the chance that this loot pool will generate
      minRolls - the minimum amount of times this loot pool should be rolled (inclusive).
      maxRolls - the maximum amount of times this loot pool should be rolled (inclusive).
      itemElements - the elements in this loot pool

    • roll

      public DragonLootElementItem roll​(Random random)
      Description copied from interface: ILootPool
